title: 5 people will share a $50,000 reward for tips that led to Brooklyn subway shooting suspect's arrest - CNN
content:
1. 5 people will share a $50,000 reward for tips that led to Brooklyn subway shooting suspect's arrest  CNN
  2. Transit heroes honored for quick actions in subway shooting  CBS New York
  3. Food prices are going up, subway shooting suspect held without bail: 5 Things podcast  USA TODAY
  4. Before Subway Attack Charges, Frank James Had Decades of Petty Offenses  The New York Times
  5. The New York subway attack is horrifying. But more police power is not the answer  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Five people will share a combined $50,000 reward for providing "critical information" that helped lead to the arrest of the Brooklyn subway shooting suspect, the NYPD announced Friday.
